name: Aritzia Inventory View Snapshot for Boyne Move
command:
[select ceil(convert(decimal, count(*)) / 100000) cnt
   from inventory_view]
|
do loop
 where count = @cnt
|
{
    publish data
     where offset = @i * 100000
    |
    [/*#limit=@offset,@limit,true*/
     select *
       from inventory_view
      order by wh_id,
            stoloc,
            lodnum,
            subnum,
            dtlnum] >> res
    |
    list warehouses
    |
    expand environment variable
     where name = '$' || @wh_id || 'outputs' || '\Detailed Inventory'
    |
    publish data
     where path = @value
    |
    write csv file
     where resdata = @res
       and filnam = 'inventory_view_part' || to_char(@i + 1) || '_' || to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') || '.csv '
       and path = @path
}
